entry.title: WIND WARNING , Crowsnest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Crowsnest 06:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
